title: Ghost Hunters
description: Lonny is a ghost history expert and his partner Jib is a supernatural tech specialist. They take us places where the EMF readings are off the charts.
quote: I rate this encounter three ghosts.
altHero: Lonny and Jib celebrating on the night vision monitor
alt1: Lonny crouching outside a small hut on a golf course at night
alt2: Jib inside the hut reading an EMF device
alt3: Lonny and Jib running, Lonny is holding up three fingers
alt4: Jib recording Lonny outside an old house
